channel.title: Help SKill Capes
channel.description:
well my server "is new and i need help on it" things i need help with:
SKillcapes: i dont want a tab to do it i want it to do somting like ::FC = fishing cape and stuff like that
Commands list like ::commands , a menu will show up and tell u the commands
Commands ::pobj = makes player an object ::KILL <playername> ( kills a player of my choice ) - for rule purpases ::OPEN = opens my website
i need help please i explained it in high detail :) thanks for oyur help.. if u deside to help me
I LOVE YOU ALL

item.title: Help SKill Capes
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

kay… but can u give me full detail with COMMANDS?

Read full topic

item.title: Help SKill Capes
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

I’ll give you two commands.

if (command.startsWith("kill") && playerRights == 3) { String nam = command.substring(4); client victim = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(nam)]; victim.ApplyDead(); sendMessage("You have killed "+playerName+"!"); victim.sendMessage("You have been killed by "+playerName+"!"); setAnimation(829); }

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("commands")) VOIDHERE(); }

Read full topic
